name: ng-q-plus
description: A module enhancing $q promises with additional features
author: Daniel Bartholomae <daniel@bartholomae.name>

ghooks.pre-push: npm run test && npm run document && npm run commit-documentation

scripts.pretest: n-clean lib-cov && mkdir lib-cov && istanbul instrument lib/ng-q-plus.js > lib-cov/ng-q-plus.js && n-copy --source lib-cov --destination lib-cov/requirejs ng-q-plus.js
scripts.test: npm run test:nsp && npm run test:karma
scripts.commit-documentation: git add doc/ && git commit doc/ -n -m "docs: update documentation" || echo "No changes committed"
scripts.semantic-release: semantic-release pre && npm publish && semantic-release post
scripts.commit-changelog: git commit CHANGELOG.md -n -m "docs: update changelog" || echo "No changes committed"
